description:
As an Admin
  I want to Create, Update and Delete categories
  So that I can manage the system inventory

elements.name: Verify API retrieves all categories when no parameters are provided

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as an Admin
multiple categories exist in the system
I am authenticated as a User
I send a GET request to "/api/categories" without any query parameters
the response status code should be 200
the response body should contain a list of all categories
each category should have the correct structure with id, name, and parentName
the response format should match the API specification

elements.name: Verify API functionality of updating a category using an existing ID

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as an Admin
I get a valid Category ID from the system
I send a PUT request to "/api/categories/{id}" with a new name "UpdatedCat"
the response status code should be 200
the response should confirm the name is "UpdatedCat"

elements.name: Verify API response when updating a non-existing category ID

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as an Admin
I send a PUT request to "/api/categories/99999" with a new name "GhostCat"
the response status code should be 404
the response should contain a "Category not found" error message

elements.name: Verify API functionality of deleting a category using an existing ID

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as an Admin
I create a temporary category to delete
I send a DELETE request to the created category endpoint
the response status code should be 204
the category should no longer exist in the system

elements.name: Verify API response when deleting a non-existing category ID

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as an Admin
I send a DELETE request to "/api/categories/99999"
the response status code should be 404
the response should contain a "Category not found" error message

name: Admin Category API Management

description:
As a User
  I want to retrieve category details
  So that I can view available categories

elements.name: Verify API response when requesting a category using a valid category ID

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as a User
I get a valid Category ID from the system
I send a GET request to "/api/categories/{id}" with the valid ID
the response status code should be 200
the response should contain the category details with the correct ID

elements.name: Verify API response when requesting a category using an invalid category ID

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as a User
I send a GET request to "/api/categories/99999"
the response status code should be 404
the response should contain a "Category Not Found" error message

elements.name: Verify API functionality of retrieving all categories (No params)

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as a User
I send a GET request to "/api/categories"
the response status code should be 200
the response should contain a list of categories

elements.name: Verify API functionality of retrieving categories with valid query parameters

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as a User
I get a valid Category ID from the system
I send a GET request to "/api/categories" with query param "page=0"
the response status code should be 200
the response should contain a list of categories

elements.name: Verify API functionality of retrieving category summary

steps.name: the API service is running
I am authenticated as a User
I send a GET request to "/api/categories/summary"
the response status code should be 200
the response should contain the category summary structure

name: User Category API Management

description:
As an Admin
  I want to manage categories
  So that I can organize the plant inventory system

elements.name: Admin should be able to search categories by name

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "admin" with password "admin123"
categories exist in the system
a category "Flowers" exists in the system
I navigate to the Category management page
I enter "Flowers" in the category search field
I click on Search button
I should see only categories matching "Flowers" in the results

elements.name: Admin should be able to add a category with both Category Name and Parent Category

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "admin" with password "admin123"
I navigate to the Category management page
I click on "Add Category" button
I enter "Roses" as Category Name
I select "Flowers" as Parent Category
I click on Add button
I should see a success message
the category "Roses" should be added to the list

elements.name: Admin should not be able to add a category without Category Name

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "admin" with password "admin123"
I navigate to the Category management page
I click on "Add Category" button
I leave Category Name field empty
I select "Flowers" as Parent Category
I click on Add button
I should see an error message below Category Name field
the category should not be added

elements.name: Admin should be able to add a category with Category Name without Parent Category

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "admin" with password "admin123"
I navigate to the Category management page
I click on "Add Category" button
I enter "MainCat" as Category Name
I leave Parent Category field empty
I click on Add button
I should see a success message
the category "MainCat" should be added to the list

elements.name: Admin should be able to delete a category from the list

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "admin" with password "admin123"
a category "TestCat" exists in the system
I navigate to the Category management page
I click on Delete action for "TestCat"
I confirm the deletion
I should see a success message
the category "TestCat" should not appear in the list

name: Admin Category Management

description:
As a Normal User
  I want to view the category management page
  So that I can check categories without modifying them

elements.name: User should see Dashboard immediately after successful login

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "Testuser" with password "test123"
I should be on the Dashboard page
I should see the page header "Dashboard"

elements.name: User should see navigation menu highlighting the active page

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "Testuser" with password "test123"
I click on "Categories" in the sidebar
the navigation menu should highlight "Categories" as active
I click on "Plants" in the sidebar
the navigation menu should highlight "Plants" as active

elements.name: User should see Category, Plants, and Sales summary on Dashboard

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "Testuser" with password "test123"
I am on the Dashboard page
I should see "Categories" summary card
I should see "Plants" summary card
I should see "Sales" summary card

elements.name: User should see appropriate message when searching for non-existent category

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "Testuser" with password "test123"
I navigate to the Category management page
I search for a category with name "NonExistentCategoryXYZ123"
I should see "No category found" message in the table

elements.name: User should see Add Category button is disabled

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "Testuser" with password "test123"
I navigate to the Category management page
I should NOT see the "Add Category" button

elements.name: User should not see Edit and Delete actions in Category Management

steps.name: I navigate to the login page
I login as "Testuser" with password "test123"
I navigate to the Category management page
the "Edit" button should not be visible

result.error_message:

steps.name: the "Delete" button should not be visible

name: Category Management User Functionality
